__e: You will go before the council, but your words will fall on deaf ears.
God has turned a deaf ear to you, I'm afraid.
And you know why? Because I'm just as bad as you. I knew this would fall on deaf ears but I just kept talking and talking.
You sent Mutt and Jeff to spy on me, didn't you? Hey?
I know the fate of the White Dove and know how she lives here.
Wow, see, that is me offering you an olive basket and that is you spitting in my face.
